title: Hydrogen Jukebox
tagline: Miami University Opera Theater's Award Winning production of Phillip Glass' "Hydrogen Jukebox"
shortDescription: Miami University Opera Theater's Award Winning production of Phillip Glass' "Hydrogen Jukebox" rehearsed and performed during the pandemic. Recipient of The American Prize in 2021 for Virtual Performance and Direction. Also the winner of NOA Division IV.
credits:
Stage Direction by Benjamin Smolder and Tiffany Lusht

Camera Director: Tiffany Lusht / Camera 2: Nate Wilkens

Musical Direction and Adaption: Benjamin Smolder

Lighting Designer: Thomas Hase 

Associate Lighting Designer: Alaina Pizzoferrato 

Vocal Coach: Christina Haan

Recording Engineering: Alex Lusht

Musicians: Steve Goers (keys), Michael LaMattina (Percussion), Eric Wurzelbacher (Sax), Rebecca Andres (Flute), Benjamin Smolder (piano)

Video Editors: Lusht/Smolder, Nate Wilkens

Costumes by Joy and Elizabeth Galbraith of Costume Gallery-Newport

Theater Liaison: Cassie Mings 

Jeremiah Plessinger as Allen Ginsberg 

Michaela Woodbrey as Noami Ginsberg

Caleb Orr as Eugene Ginsberg

Andrew McLesse as Neil Cassady

Kate Trybus aas Carolyn Cassady

Lauren Maynus as Joyce Johnson

Aaron Garner as Jack Kerouac

Mike Rellick as William S. Burroughs

Joseph Browning as The General

Nate Wilkens as The Capitalist 

Evan Lusht as Young Ginsberg 

Ensemble: Anna Greco, Cari Sullivan, Ellie Wilmes, Kate Ullery, Madison Wells

Dancers: John Litzler and Cody Szarko
